content.en: Cloud property retrieval: Scientists are using satellite data and algorithms to study cloud properties over Europe and globally. The Satellite Application Facility on Climate Monitoring (CM-SAF), NASA Earth Observing System (EOS), and other organizations are developing algorithms to accurately retrieve cloud properties from satellite observations. These algorithms are helping researchers understand the differences between different satellite instruments and improve the accuracy of cloud property retrievals.
content.da: Skyegenskabsudtrækning: Videnskabsfolk bruger satellitdata og algoritmer til at studere skyegenskaber over Europa og globalt. Satellite Application Facility on Climate Monitoring (CM-SAF), NASA Earth Observing System (EOS) og andre organisationer udvikler algoritmer til præcist at udtrække skyegenskaber fra satellitobservationer. Disse algoritmer hjælper forskere med at forstå forskellene mellem forskellige satellitinstrumenter og forbedre nøjagtigheden af skyegenskabsudtrækninger.
